item.title: Guide to the Web Crypto API: Building a Zero-Knowledge Vault Without External Libs
item.author: libretechsystems@placeq.com (Gray Blowfish)
item.description: In an era where data breaches are not a matter of if but when, the responsibility of protecting user data has shifted from the server to the client.
